channel.title: Help with setting up multiple Workstations
channel.description: How can I create the second Whonix-Workstation VM if I don't have fresh, clean first Workstation VM? I cannot clone Workstation VM because the first one is already dirty. Any way to set up the second Workstation without deleting the first one? Thank you.

item.title: Help with setting up multiple Workstations
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Rename existing one. Then re-import new one.
Or rename new VM during import wizard.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with setting up multiple Workstations
